post:
First thing: Liam said I could post here
Second thing: Yes, this is the same as I posted in the cest pit, then deleted. I found out URPad doesn't do refunds :)

With that out of the way, here's the deal: I have a URPad VPS I bought on an impulse, but am realizing now I really didn't need. So, I'd like to sell it off to someone here. The specs are as follows:

40 GB Hard Drive
768 MB Guaranteed RAM
1024 MB Burstable RAM
750 GB Bandwidth
100Mbps Port
1 IP Address
OpenVZ
Located in Chicaco (test IP: 198.144.179.130)
Currently has Ubuntu 12.04 on it, but of course you can reinstall it.

This is the $19/yr ["2K13JAN768MB"](https://billing.urpad.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=233) plan. I've had it for 10 days and done nothing with it, and you can get it now for **$15 for the year** (until February 11, 2014). There is, I'm sure, no better price/spec ratio currently available right now. I've talked with URPad, and they'll do the transfer. If you're interested, PM me.
